values.mesTrackerTemplate:
Time: {{Time}}
Location: {{Location}}
Weather: {{Weather}}
Tracker
Topics: {{#join "; " Topics}}
Present: {{#join "; " CharactersPresent}}
{{#foreach Characters character}}
{{character}}:
Gender: {{character.Gender}}
Age: {{character.Age}}
Hair: {{character.Hair}}
Makeup: {{character.Makeup}}
Outfit: {{character.Outfit}}
State: {{character.StateOfDress}}
Position: {{character.PostureAndInteraction}}
BustWaistHip: {{character.BustWaistHip}}
FertilityCycle: {{character.FertilityCycle}}
Pregnancy: {{character.Pregnancy}}
Virginity: {{character.Virginity}}
Traits: {{character.Traits}}
Children: {{character.Children}}
{{/foreach}}

field-0.name: Time
field-0.prompt: Adjust time in small increments for natural progression unless explicit directives (fast forward, skip ahead, advance X time) or narrative cues (3 days passed, next morning, after a week) indicate larger changes. For initial setup, prioritize any time context from character or lore narratives. Scan context for time changes and apply precisely. Format: HH:MM:SS; MM/DD/YYYY (Day Name).

field-1.name: Location
field-1.prompt: Provide a **detailed and specific location**, including exact places like rooms, landmarks, or stores, following this format: "Specific Place, Building, City, State". Avoid unintended reuse of specific locations from previous examples. Example: "Food court, second floor near east wing entrance, Madison Square Mall, Los Angeles, CA".
exampleValues: Conference Room B, 12th Floor, Apex Corporation, New York, NY
Main Gym Hall, Maple Street Fitness Center, Denver, CO

field-2.name: Weather
field-2.prompt: Describe current weather concisely to set the scene. Example: "Light Drizzle, Cool Outside".

field-4.name: PrimaryTopic
field-4.prompt: **One- or two-word topic** describing main activity or focus of the scene.

field-5.name: EmotionalTone
field-5.prompt: **One- or two-word topic** describing dominant emotional atmosphere of the scene.

field-6.name: InteractionTheme
field-6.prompt: **One- or two-word topic** describing primary type of interactions or relationships in the scene.

field-7.name: CharactersPresent
field-7.prompt: List all characters currently present in an array format.

field-8.name: Characters
field-8.prompt: For each character, update the following details:

field-9.name: Gender
field-9.prompt: A single world and an emoji for Character gender.
field-9.defaultValue: <Current gender if no update is needed>

field-10.name: Age
field-10.prompt: A single number displays character age based on Narrative. Change with time advancement. Or "Unkown" if unkown.
field-10.defaultValue: <Current Age if no update is needed>

field-11.name: Hair
exampleValues: ["Shoulder-length blonde hair, styled straight", "Short black hair, neatly combed", "Long curly brown hair, pulled back into a low bun"]
["Short brown hair, damp with sweat", "Medium-length red hair, tied up in a high ponytail"]
["Short sandy blonde hair, slightly tousled", "Long wavy brown hair, loose and flowing"]

field-12.name: Makeup
exampleValues: ["Natural look with light foundation and mascara", "None", "Subtle eyeliner and nude lipstick"]

field-13.name: Outfit
field-13.prompt: **IMPORTANT!** List the complete outfit, including **underwear and accessories**, even if the character is undressed. **Underwear must always be included in the outfit description. If underwear is intentionally missing, specify this clearly (e.g. "No Bra", "No Panties").** Outfit should stay the same until changed for a new one.
field-13.defaultValue: <Full outfit description, even if removed including color, fabric, and style details; **always include underwear and accessories if present. If underwear is intentionally missing, specify clearly**>
exampleValues: ["Navy blue blazer over a white silk blouse; Gray pencil skirt; Black leather belt; Sheer black stockings; Black leather pumps; Pearl necklace; Silver wristwatch; White lace balconette bra; White lace hipster panties matching the bra", "Dark gray suit; Light blue dress shirt; Navy tie with silver stripes; Black leather belt; Black dress shoes; Black socks; White cotton crew-neck undershirt; Black cotton boxer briefs", "Cream-colored blouse with ruffled collar; Black slacks; Brown leather belt; Brown ankle boots; Gold hoop earrings; Beige satin push-up bra; Beige satin bikini panties matching the bra"]

["Gray moisture-wicking t-shirt; Black athletic shorts; White ankle socks; Gray running shoes; Black sports watch; Blue compression boxer briefs", "Black sports tank top; Purple athletic leggings; Black athletic sneakers; White ankle socks; Fitness tracker bracelet; Black racerback sports bra; Black seamless athletic bikini briefs matching the bra"]

["Light blue short-sleeve shirt; Khaki shorts; Brown leather sandals; Silver wristwatch; Blue plaid cotton boxer shorts", "White sundress over a red halter bikini; Straw hat; Brown flip-flops; Gold anklet; Red halter bikini top; Red tie-side bikini bottoms matching the top"]

field-14.name: StateOfDress
field-14.prompt: Describe how put-together or disheveled the character appears, including any removed clothing. Note where clothing items from outfit were discarded.
field-14.defaultValue: <Current state of dress if no update is needed. Note location where discarded outfit items are placed if character is undressed>
exampleValues: ["Professionally dressed, neat appearance", "Professionally dressed, attentive", "Professionally dressed, organized"]
["Shirt and sandals removed, placed on beach towel", "Sundress and hat removed, placed on beach chair"]

field-15.name: PostureAndInteraction
field-15.prompt: Describe physical posture, position relative to others or objects, and interactions.
field-15.defaultValue: <Current posture and interaction if no update is needed>
exampleValues: ["Standing at the podium, presenting slides, holding a laser pointer", "Sitting at the conference table, taking notes on a laptop", "Sitting next to James, reviewing printed documents"]
["Lifting weights at the bench press, focused on form", "Running on the treadmill at a steady pace"]
["Standing at the water's edge, feet in the surf", "Lying on a beach towel, sunbathing with eyes closed"]

field-16.name: BustWaistHip
field-16.prompt: **Female Character only!** Display Bust/Waist/Hip measurements in centimetre based on narrative. Or "Unkown" if unknown.
field-16.defaultValue: <Current BustWaistHip if no update is needed>

field-17.name: FertilityCycle
field-17.prompt: **Female Character only!** Displays the current fertility cycle stage. States advance with time. If Pregnancy tracking indicates conception, immediately switch FertilityCycle to "Pregnant ğŸ‘¶" and pause the cycle. Remain "Pregnant ğŸ‘¶" for the full duration of pregnancy. Resume cycle after delivery.
field-17.defaultValue: <Current fertility cycle if no update is needed>

field-18.name: Pregnancy
field-18.prompt: **Female Character only!** Perform a d100 roll post-creampie scene to determine conception, chances are based on fertility cycle: Menstrual (0%), Follicular (15%), Ovulating (85%), Luteal (30%), Pregnant (0%) (e.g., rolled 80 during ovulating phase, 80<85, then yes. ). If yes, track days pregnant and trimester (1st: 0-90; 2nd: 91-180; 3rd: 181-270). Describe this with father's name.
field-18.defaultValue: <Current Pregnancy if no update is needed>

field-19.name: Virginity
field-19.prompt: If virgin: "Virgin" else "Lost to {partner}".  Or "Unkown" if unkown.
field-19.defaultValue: <Current Virginity if no update is needed>

field-20.name: Traits
field-20.prompt: Add or Remove trait based on Narrative. "{trait}: {short description}"
field-20.defaultValue: <Current Traits if no update is needed>
exampleValues: ["Giant Penis: causes tearing pain to partner during sex.", "Emotional Intelligence: deeply philosophical and sentimental"]
["Tight Pussy: increase partner pleasure during sex.", "Masochist: gain pleasure from pain.", "Sadistic: deriving pleasure from inflicting pain."]

field-21.name: Children
field-21.prompt: Add child after birth based on Narrative. Format: "{Birth Order}: {Name}, {Gender + Symbol}, child with {Other Parent}"
field-21.defaultValue: <Current Children if no update is needed>
exampleValues: ["1st Born: Eve, Female â™€ï¸, child with Harry"]
["1st Born: Aya, Female â™€ï¸, child with Bob", "2nd Born: Max, Male â™‚ï¸, child with Sam"]

field-9.name: StoryEvents
field-9.prompt: Lifecycle event log used to coordinate internal tracker automations.
exampleValues: {"BirthEvents": {"Mira": {"NewBornDescription": "Mira, the newborn of Harry and Monika, female â€” she sleeps in short bursts, cries softly when hungry, and cannot yet focus her bright blue eyes on anything distant."}}, "GrowthEvents": {"Molly Thompson": {"GrowthDescription": "Molly Thompson has grown into an energetic teenager with her father Jack's athletic build and her mother Rose's quick wit."}}, "DeathEvents": {"Sir Alden": {"DeathCauseDescription": "Sir Alden fell defending the northern gate, struck down by the dragon's final burst of flame."}}}

internal-story-birth-events.name: BirthEvents
internal-story-birth-events.prompt: Count only completed births â€” the baby must be fully delivered and present. Ignore labor, contractions, or partial delivery. Use "Unnamed baby of <mother name>" for unnamed babies. For each newborn, update the details:

internal-story-birth-description.name: NewBornDescription
internal-story-birth-description.prompt: Describe the newborn, including name, gender, parents, appearance, notable traits, and their immediate newborn behaviours (e.g., crying, sleeping patterns, inability to speak or walk).
exampleValues: Mira, the newborn of Harry and Monika, female â€” she sleeps in short bursts, cries softly when hungry, and cannot yet focus her bright blue eyes on anything distant.
Molly, the newborn of Jack and Rose, female â€” she clenches her tiny fists, reacts to her parents' voices, and only communicates with soft whimpers.
Arwen, the newborn of Elrond and CelebrÃ­an, female â€” she has luminous eyes, slightly pointed ears, and can only express herself through gentle coos.

internal-story-growth-events.name: GrowthEvents
internal-story-growth-events.prompt: Track major growth milestones for existing characters. For each update, provide a complete, card-ready description that reflects current age, physical changes, behavioural shifts, skills, relationships, and notable story developments.

internal-story-growth-description.name: GrowthDescription
internal-story-growth-description.prompt: Provide a full character description reflecting the current stage of life: appearance, age, personality, behaviour, skills, relationships, and any recent narrative developments.
exampleValues: Mira Thompson, now five years old, has inquisitive blue eyes, a restless mind, and a fearless curiosity. She chatters endlessly about the world she discovers each day and already mimics her mother Monika's analytical instincts.

Molly Johnson has grown into an energetic teenager with her father Jack's athletic build and her mother Rose's quick wit. She balances school with competitive swimming, and her confidence is tempered by a fierce loyalty to her family.

Arwen Half-elven now stands as a poised young adult, carrying the wisdom of her father Elrond and the grace of her mother CelebrÃ­an. Her luminous eyes reflect centuries of elven memory, and she moves through Rivendell as a calming presence and diplomat.

internal-story-death-events.name: DeathEvents
internal-story-death-events.prompt: Track characters whose stories have ended. For each death, provide the character name and a concise description of how and why they died, along with any immediate narrative consequences.

internal-story-death-description.name: DeathCauseDescription
internal-story-death-description.prompt: Summarize the cause of death and any immediate aftermath or impact on the narrative.
exampleValues: Sir Alden fell defending the northern gate, struck down by the dragon's final burst of flame.
Mira Thompson passed peacefully at the age of 84, surrounded by family after a lifetime of pioneering research.
The unnamed soldier perished during the midnight ambush, triggering the retreat of the remaining scouts.

values.generateRequestPrompt:
[è¯·åˆ†æä¸Šä¸€æ¡æ¶ˆæ¯ä»¥åŠä¸‹æ–¹æä¾›çš„è¿‘æœŸæ¶ˆæ¯ï¼Œç»“åˆæ˜ç¡®ç»†èŠ‚ä¸åˆç†æ¨æ–­æ›´æ–°å½“å‰åœºæ™¯è¿½è¸ªå™¨ã€‚è¯·å…ˆåœé¡¿æ€è€ƒï¼Œä»…è¾“å‡ºè¿½è¸ªæ•°æ®ï¼Œå¹¶ä½¿ç”¨ {{trackerFormat}} æ ¼å¼ã€‚é™¤éç‰¹åˆ«è¯´æ˜ï¼Œä¸è¦æ–°å¢ã€åˆ é™¤æˆ–é‡æ–°æ’åºå­—æ®µã€‚æ¯æ¬¡éƒ½è¦è¿”å›å®Œæ•´è¿½è¸ªå™¨ã€‚
